mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_delivery(userId, recipients, phone, province, city, area, address, postCode, createDate, updateDate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recipients}, #{phone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{postCode}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO t_delivery(userId, recipients, phone, province, city, area, address, postCode, createDate, updateDate, wechat) VALUES(#{userId}, #{recipients}, #{phone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{postCode}, NOW(), NOW(), #{wechat})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_delivery SET recipients=#{recipients}, phone=#{phone}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, area=#{area}, address=#{address}, postCode=#{postCode}, updateDate=NOW() WHERE userId=#{userId}
